meanings.definition: Not drained or emptied of liquid.
meanings.sent1: The undrained sponge was heavy with water.
meanings.sent2: The undrained swamp was a breeding ground for mosquitoes.
meanings.sent3: The undrained bathtub made for a soggy surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her undrained tears flowed freely down her cheeks.
meanings.sent5: The undrained pool reflected the cloudy sky above.

meanings.definition: Not having had excess water removed.
meanings.sent1: The undrained soil was muddy and slippery.
meanings.sent2: The undrained rice cooker left the grains soggy.
meanings.sent3: The undrained glass of water spilled over the table.
meanings.sent4: His undrained glass of juice overflowed with sweetness.
meanings.sent5: The undrained sponge soaked up every drop of liquid.

meanings.definition: Not having had water or other liquid removed.
meanings.sent1: The undrained pipe leaked water onto the floor.
meanings.sent2: The undrained pot of soup simmered on the stove.
meanings.sent3: The undrained cup of tea left a ring on the table.
meanings.sent4: Her undrained eyes glistened with unshed tears.
meanings.sent5: The undrained sponge absorbed all the spilled milk.
